hero.subtitle: Your journey to clean sports starts here

feature1.title: Supplement Verification
feature1.description: AI-powered analysis of supplement safety and WADA compliance, ensuring athletes' health and fair competition.
feature1.details: Our verification system cross-references global databases, providing instant, comprehensive supplement safety assessments.

feature2.title: Professional Network
feature2.description: Exclusive community platform connecting athletes, coaches, and anti-doping experts worldwide.
feature2.details: Secure, moderated forums for sharing experiences, seeking advice, and building a transparent athletic community.

feature3.title: Knowledge Ecosystem
feature3.description: Comprehensive educational resources on anti-doping standards.
feature3.details: Interactive learning modules, expert-curated content, and multimedia resources exploring ethical sporting practices.

feature4.title: Interactive Games
feature4.description: Engage in fun, educational games designed to promote awareness about anti-doping practices.
feature4.details: Challenge your peers in quizzes and interactive games, featuring a global leaderboard to foster healthy competition.

feature5.title: TUE Guidance
feature5.description: Personalized guidance for Therapeutic Use Exemptions (TUE) application and approval processes.
feature5.details: Step-by-step assistance in submitting TUE applications, ensuring compliance with WADA regulations.

feature6.title: Latest News & Journals
feature6.description: Stay informed with curated news, journals, and real-life case studies in the world of anti-doping.
feature6.details: Explore expert analyses, scientific breakthroughs, and inspiring stories from athletes' journeys to clean sport.

newsletter.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address
newsletter.title: Stay at the Forefront
newsletter.subtitle: Receive cutting-edge insights, regulatory updates, and exclusive athlete resources

connect.title: With NADA
connect.subtitle: Follow us on our social media platforms:

timelineEvents.title: Evolution of Fair Play in Sports

timelineEvents1.title: Birth of Anti-Doping Movement
timelineEvents1.description: First anti-doping initiatives introduced in international sports to promote fair competition.
timelineEvents1.achievements2: Creation of initial banned substance list

timelineEvents2.title: WADA Establishment
timelineEvents2.description: World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) formed to promote and coordinate the fight against doping in sports.

timelineEvents3.title: World Anti-Doping Code
timelineEvents3.description: First universal anti-doping code implemented across all sports and countries.

timelineEvents4.title: NADA India Establishment
timelineEvents4.description: National Anti-Doping Agency (NADA) established by Indian Government to promote doping-free sports.

timelineEvents5.title: Enhanced Testing Methods
timelineEvents5.description: Introduction of the Athlete Biological Passport and advanced testing procedures.

timelineEvents6.title: Digital Revolution & Indian Leadership
timelineEvents6.description: Implementation of AI and data analytics in anti-doping efforts, with NADA India adopting modern approaches.

timelineEvents7.title: Ministry of Youth Affairs Initiatives
timelineEvents7.description: Enhanced support from Indian Ministry of Youth Affairs for anti-doping programs.

report.title: SPEAK UP!
report.textBeforeEmail: To ensure clean sports, NADA India seeks cooperation from all stakeholders. If you observe any doping-related misconduct, report it immediately at

aboutPodcastDescription: Dive deep into anti-doping research, technology, law, and policy. This podcast, presented by the Partnership for Clean Competition, features expert insights from scientists, sport organizations, athletes, and clean sport champions.
missionItems: Educate on anti-doping science and policies
presentedBy: Presented by: Partnership for Clean Competition
